properties.address: Borth Community Hub, Clarach Rd, Borth SY245LW
properties.description: A Community Space where we usually also run a pay as you feel cafe from 11.30 to 13.30 . We serve a variety of warming home cooked foods . We also run a number of activities throughout the day which vary from week to week. Please see our Facebook page for updates .
properties.title: Borth Community Hub

properties.description: A community centre near the town library and cinema open 10.30 - 14.00 on Tuesdays and Thursdays offering hot meal (pay-as-you-feel) 12.15-13.15 and boardgames on Friday evenings (19.00-21.00).
properties.title: St Paul's Methodist Centre

properties.address: The Arcade, 5 Bath St, Aberystwyth SY23 2NN
properties.description:
A series of craft workshops focussed on making and mending textiles, drawing upon heritage methods of sustainably, communally and cosily crafting. Friday 6th December - Frame Loom Weaving for Beginners
Friday 13th December - Star and Pom Pom Garlands
Friday 3rd January - Visible Mending - Darning
Friday 17th January - Visible Mending - Patching Friday 7th February - Crochet for Absolute Beginners
Friday 21st February - Frame Loom Weaving for Beginners
Friday 7th March - Visible Mending - Darning
Friday 21st March - Visible Mending - Patching Booking Essential - maeverosemoran@gmail.com and see website ecohubaber.com for more information
properties.title: Eco Hub Aber
